column5: not sure if anyone cares but the Minn Kota Trolling Motor Power Center is on sale at amazon for 69  https://www.amazon.ca/Minn-Kota-Trolling-Motor-Center/dp/B001PTHKMG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1467686922&sr=8-1&keywords=boat+battery
I was thinking about getting one...thanks for the heads up!
If you have to pay for shipping it could be better idea to order from Sail https://www.sail.ca/en/minn-kota-trolling-motor-power-center-180324
If you have to pay for shipping it could be better idea to order from Sail https://www.sail.ca/en/minn-kota-trolling-motor-power-center-180324  Shipping is free.
